Comment: The isocode given for PARALEX is that of Asho Chin, of which Hyow is considered to be a dialect. However, Hyow is not readily mututally intelligible with Asho and thus this isocode should not be used to refer to Hyow.
The isocode given for PARALEX actually refers to a group of varieties (‘Halam’), many of which exhibit low mutual intelligibility with Ranglong. We discourage using this isocode for Ranglong.
